name: Budget Rate Stigmata
description:
HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED

wasd to move
space to jump
mouse to look
e or left click to interact

It took longer than I wish it did to gather enough courage to go to that apartment building alone, but I need to know what's at the bottom of The Drift.
